name: Mayank, my bihari ji
greetingText: Your name holds a universe within it, just like you do.
wishText: May life always be as kind to you as you are to everyone around you.
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday, Mayank! You deserve all the love and happiness in the world.
text2: I could have just sent a simple wish...
text4: Because you mean so much more to me.
text5Content: You are one of the best things that ever happened to me.
outroText: Now tell me, did this bring a smile to your face? Because that's all I ever want.
replayText: Or click, if you want to feel loved all over again.
